txt.en: You should return to the entrance of the dungeon
You should return to the entrance of the dungeon.
You have been tasked with collecting gears and redirecting the flow of water within the dwarf-made waterways of Shalakâm.
'Great work, [placeholder]! With all the water redirected, let us return and report your success to Hórin!'
You should redirect the flow of the water and collect any gears that you find.
